name: PixelNovel
tag_list: design, designers, workflow, asset-management, photoshop, subversion, svn, version-control
overview:
PixelNovel makes version control tools for graphic designers.

PixelNovel’s products are based on open-source software (Subversion) and are integrated directly into design software such as Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator and InDesign. We strive to make our tools as intuitive and easy-to-use as possible.

Products are:

  • Timeline, the version control system for Adobe software which is a Creative Suite plug-in and a Subversion client. The unique visual concept allows designers to see all file versions within the smoothly integrated Timeline panel and helps to avoid switching from the main application in order to submit new versions and get previous versions of their files.

  • PixelNovel accounts for design files storage. This product provides a quick hassle-free solution for those who don’t have their own SVN server. Together with the storage space designers get the feature-rich web interface and powerful collaboration tools.
